body: I noticed that some people on Avicus are going afk for a long time.. is that allowed? On other servers it kicks you and is not allowed
body_tagged: I noticed that some people on Avicus are going afk for a long time.. is that allowed? On other servers it kicks you and is not allowed
title: Going AFK

replies.body: Its a cheap way to bring your playtime up -___- when you leave, you just leave yourself afk.....it shouldnt be allowed
replies.body_tagged: Its a cheap way to bring your playtime up -___- when you leave, you just leave yourself afk.....it shouldnt be allowed

replies.body: Yes I know it is, I know exactly who is doing it but i'm not mentioning names
replies.body_tagged: Yes I know it is, I know exactly who is doing it but i'm not mentioning names

reply_to.body: Its a cheap way to bring your playtime up -___- when you leave, you just leave yourself afk.....it shouldnt be allowed
reply_to.body_tagged: Its a cheap way to bring your playtime up -___- when you leave, you just leave yourself afk.....it shouldnt be allowed

replies.body:
On a side note, I see mods AFK a lot in the lobbies. I'm feel like that's one of their duties or something if they're waiting for a report.

But anyways.
I do think they should be kicked after a certain number of minutes. Besides, why would you want to raise your playtime up anyways? What good does it bring to them? .-.
replies.body_tagged:
On a side note, I see mods AFK a lot in the lobbies. I'm feel like that's one of their duties or something if they're waiting for a report.

But anyways.
I do think they should be kicked after a certain number of minutes. Besides, why would you want to raise your playtime up anyways? What good does it bring to them? .-.

replies.body: People AFK because they're AFK, not because they want to bring their playtime up.
replies.body_tagged: People AFK because they're AFK, not because they want to bring their playtime up.

replies.body: Yeah, that's true .-. Tbh I don't see why people should or shouldn't be kicked. There's no way that playtime will ever do you any good (unless you want to have the most playtime on the server, idk) so it's really up to the staff to decide if they want AFKers to be kicked...
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, that's true .-. Tbh I don't see why people should or shouldn't be kicked. There's no way that playtime will ever do you any good (unless you want to have the most playtime on the server, idk) so it's really up to the staff to decide if they want AFKers to be kicked...

reply_to.body: People AFK because they're AFK, not because they want to bring their playtime up.
reply_to.body_tagged: People AFK because they're AFK, not because they want to bring their playtime up.

replies.body: I go afk in walls and CTH until the game starts and that's how I have 51 days online .-.
replies.body_tagged: I go afk in walls and CTH until the game starts and that's how I have 51 days online .-.

replies.body: IvyCode's been online for 6 days 12 hours, but I bet 6 of those days, he was AFK
replies.body_tagged: IvyCode's been online for 6 days 12 hours, but I bet 6 of those days, he was AFK

replies.body: Online time doesn't really matter. So I wouldnt say it's a big problem.
replies.body_tagged: Online time doesn't really matter. So I wouldnt say it's a big problem.
